desc: Centrally located in Silicon Valley, this exceptional restaurant has epitomized fine dining since its founding in 1977. California-inspired modern French cuisine using sustainable ingredients is beautifully presented by Chef Scott Cooper at this elegant, award-winning (Zagat, Michelin, Mercury News) ...MORE

At lunch or dinnertime, it seems half of Silicon Valley is streaming into Birk’s. Located just off Highway 101 and Great America Parkway, this first-rate establishment has a vibrant city atmosphere. Offering the finest of steaks, chops, and impeccably fresh seafood—cooked over almond ...MORE

The spirit of Brazil meets luxury and extravagance at this downtown Palo Alto restaurant, where diners can enjoy the authenticity of a Brazilian churrascaria. The chef’s expertly assembled list of more than a dozen meats can be experienced in true unlimited rodizio fashion; coupled with a bountiful ...MORE

Creative food made from scratch, herbs from the living wall, vegetables from the roof-top garden, and other carefully sourced organic, farm-raised products celebrate the Bay Area’s ethnic and cult ...more

This warm and unpretentious eatery offers seasonally changing small plates with locally sourced ingredients, showcasing California's cornucopia of fruit, vegetables, nuts, and grains. The full bar serves clas ...more
European-inspired cuisine is made with rich, local ingredients, with crêpes a specialty. Choice of casual table service in the dining room with flat screen TVS throughout, or in the beautiful patio.
Burlingame locals enjoy Alana’s cozy, neighborhood atmosphere, whether at the lunch counter for a quick snack or at a candlelit table for a leisurely dinner. The menu offers "comfort food” co ...more

This steakhouses offers a luxury experience with premium cuts and a Japanese twist; steaks are dry-aged in house, and Japanese Kobe beef imported from Japan.

Located in the heart of downtown Redwood City, Arya offers fine Persian cuisine, along with some of the chef's favorite Italian dishes, in a warm and personable ambiance. Fri-Sat entertainment includes b ...more

A list of 50 carefully selected wines are paired with Italian-style appetizers at B Street & Vine wine café. Music, flavorful bruschetta, an outdoor patio and a lively bar create a fun and relaxing atmosphere.

Reflecting the local gastronomic diversity and featuring sustainable seafood, organic produce, and hand-cut, all-natural meats, the seasonally-changing menu of American fare includes many Spanish and Italian influences.
Influenced by macrobiotic cooking, Chef Bruno Chemel's modern French cuisine combines ancient traditions with modern techniques.
An eclectic, family-style menu draws influences from classic American to Asian to Latin cuisines.

Modern Tokyo design, anime, sake cocktails and deliciously unconventional sushi combine at this concept restaurant, which emphasizes clean, modern and eclectic take on traditional Japanese cuisine.

Buca di Beppo gets to the heart of fresh Italian cooking with family-style platters of Chicken Carbonara, imported Italian Spaghetti. tiramisu with homemade lady fingers and more, all served in a fun, welcoming setting.

This quaint french bistro offers French and Californian cuisine with fresh ingredients and no shortage of savory options to choose from; an outstanding brunch features made-to-order beignets, and on warmer days ...more

Chef Luis Ugalde blends Mediterranean cuisine with African flavors and spiced at this scenic coastside restaurant, which has received recognition and awards from Zagat, Fodor's, Wine Enthusiast magazine and even Michelin Guide.
